    • searchMarkets

      public static List<String> searchMarkets(String query, Double latitude, Double longitude, Double radius)
      Searches for markets based on the query and returns a list of results.
      Parameters:
      query - the search query
      latitude - the latitude for distance-based search
      longitude - the longitude for distance-based search
      radius - the radius for distance-based search
      Returns:
      a list of search results

    • hasUserReviewed

      public boolean hasUserReviewed(int marketId, String name)
      Checks if a user has already reviewed a specific market.
      Parameters:
      marketId - the ID of the market
      name - the name of the user
      Returns:
      true if the user has already reviewed the market, false otherwise

    • addReview

      Adds a new review to the database.
      Parameters:
      marketId - the ID of the market
      name - the name of the user
      rating - the rating given by the user
      comment - the comment left by the user
